data: It was a wonderful thing to see the way he rose and stepped forward, and stood before the people, and their cheering was like the shout of winds in a forest.
IT was a wonderful thing to see the way he rose and stepped forward, and stood before the people, and their cheering was like the shout of winds in a forest.
The Turning of Griggsby: Being a Story of Keeping up with Dan'l Webster
Bacheller, Irving, 1859-1950; Birch, Reginald B. (Reginald Bathurst), 1856-1943 [Illustrator]
